string-array.name: whats_new_311
string-array.item: The list of parties (payers and payees) is searchable

string-array.name: whats_new_310
string-array.item: Transactions can be mapped to multiple tags

string-array.name: whats_new_308
string-array.item: Multiple accounts can now be exported into one file

string-array.name: whats_new_305
string-array.item: New implementation for synchronization via Dropbox and Drive

string-array.name: whats_new_303
string-array.item: Sync now button in main menu
Immediate synchronization after local changes can be disabled

string-array.name: whats_new_301
string-array.item: Accounts can be closed and/or hidden

string-array.name: whats_new_299
string-array.item: Encryption for backups and synchronization data

string-array.name: whats_new_298
string-array.item: Filter for transactions without mapping to categories, payees or methods

string-array.name: whats_new_293
string-array.item: Account groups (per type or currency) can be collapsed

string-array.name: whats_new_292
string-array.item: Synchronization can be limited to Wi-Fi

string-array.name: whats_new_291
string-array.item: Optionally distinguish between booking date and value date

string-array.name: whats_new_290
string-array.item: Multiple transactions can be grouped into one split transaction

string-array.name: whats_new_289
string-array.item: Conversion between foreign currencies and home currency

string-array.name: whats_new_283
string-array.item: Ascending sort direction (oldest transactions on top)

string-array.name: whats_new_282
string-array.item: Templates and plans for split transactions
Home screen widgets adapt to user-preferred font size

string-array.name: whats_new_281
string-array.item: Fix cloud storage of large backups
